t: Monarch Robe & Towel Company Acquires Top Competitor, Cypress Luxury Bath & Bed
s: June 30, 2018 - PERTH AMBOY, N.J., July 15, 2011 /PRNewswire/ -- Monarch Robe & Towel Co., a leading supplier of fine bathrobes and towels to the global hospitality industry, announces the full acquisition of its biggest rival, Cypress Luxury Bath & Bed Amenities, from Russell Newman Brands.
